title: Design Vibe Check
description: A quick check-in to understand your design needs and preferences

questions.question: Which room are you most interested in designing?
How do you prefer to communicate during a design project?
options: Email - I like detailed written communication
In-Person - I want to meet face-to-face
Mix - I'm flexible with communication methods

thankYouMessage: Thank you for sharing! Based on your responses, I'd love to learn more about your project. Check out the Project Readiness Checklist to help organize your thoughts, or reach out directly to schedule a consultation.
